 CarCompanion (later in the text: "we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our car management mobile application. By using CarCompanion, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.


1. Information We Collect:
 - Personal Information: Name, email address, or other identifiers if provided during registration.
 - Vehicle Information: Details about your car, such as make, model, mileage, and maintenance history.
 - Usage Data: Information about how you use the app, such as features accessed and time spent on the app.
 - Device Information: Data about your device, such as operating system and app version.


2. How We Use Your Information:
 We use your information to:
 - Provide and improve app functionality.
 - Track and manage your vehicle’s maintenance schedules.
 - Send reminders or notifications about upcoming services or deadlines.
 - Ensure app security and stability.


3. Sharing Your Information:
 We do not sell your information. We may share it only:
 - With service providers who assist us in operating the app (e.g., cloud storage).
 - If required by law or to protect our legal rights.


4. Data Security:
 We implement reasonable measures to secure your data from unauthorized access or disclosure. However, no method of data transmission or storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.


5. Your Rights:
 You have the right to:
 - Access and review the personal data we hold about you.
 - Request corrections or deletions of your personal data.
 - Opt out of notifications or certain data collection features via app settings.


6. Changes to This Policy:
 We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes through the app or other appropriate channels.


7. Contact Us:
 If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at:
 Email: support@carcompanion.com
 Address: Unska ulica 3, 10000, Zagreb, Croatia
